STRONGER THAN EVER: Made for dogs 50 lbs and up with fiberglass-reinforced casing, the Adventure XL tracker is waterproof and durable enough for any environment, whether it’s mud, snow, or off-leash exploring with up to 1 month of battery life.

name: 2-in-1 GPS Tracker & Dog Light - Smart Tracking Pet LED Light for iOS Only - Rechargeable IP68 Waterproof Dog Collar Light with 6 Modes for Night Walking - Works with Apple Find My, No Subscription
short_description: All-in-One Safety & Tracking: The world's first 2-in-1 smart dog light that combines a bright LED dog collar light with Apple Find My tracking. (Separate controls: one button for tracking, one for strobe)

Real-Time Tracking: Track your dog in real-time using the Find My app—with no monthly fee or subscription. This dog tracker light allows continuous location monitoring, giving you peace of mind and an added layer of security.

Superior Safety & Waterproof: Magnetic-contact charging eliminates exposed ports for an IP68 rating (resistant to rain, snow, and dust). The shock-resistant plastic construction ensures enhanced safety over plug-in designs.

Super Bright 6 Modes: This GPS dog collar light with ultra-bright LEDs visible from 1,600 ft and 6 modes—including an emergency RGB flash—this LED dog light keeps your dog highly visible and safe on night walking, camping, running, hiking, cycling.

Long-Lasting Battery: USB rechargeable with up to 20 hours of runtime. The Find My tracking continues for up to 240 hours after the pet light dims, ensuring you can always locate your dog without ever needing batteries.

Versatile Use: Crafted from ultra-lightweight yet durable materials. Not just for pet use, it's also perfect for running, dog walking, cycling, hiking, fishing, camping, and nighttime work - your ideal all-purpose light for any adventure!

Perfect Gift Idea: This tracking dog light is a must-have for dog owners. It's combining practicality with safety. Ideal for birthdays, holidays, or any occasion, showing you care about their furry family member's safety.
What You Will Get: Package Includes 1 GPS tracker Light, 1 Charging Cable, 1 Carabiner, 1 User Manual; If you have any questions, our customer support team is always ready to help.
